title: SAP RAP Patterns
name: SAP RAP Patterns
description: Patterns and best practices for RESTful ABAP Programming Model (RAP) business object development

axiomAlignment.A1_verifiability: RAP patterns include ABAP Unit tests, behavior validation, and framework-managed CRUD for verification
axiomAlignment.A2_user_primacy: Managed BOs and draft handling prioritize user workflows and data integrity
axiomAlignment.A3_transparency: Explicit CDS views, behavior definitions, and service bindings make structure clear
axiomAlignment.A4_non_harm: Authorization patterns, validation, and error handling ensure safe operations
axiomAlignment.A5_consistency: Unified I_/C_ view naming, draft handling, and ETag patterns across RAP objects

rap-determination.name: Determination Pattern
rap-determination.description: Automatic field calculation and side effects

code.bdef:
determination setEntityID on modify { create; }
determination calculateTotal on modify { create; update; }
code.implementation:
METHOD setEntityID.
  " Read entities
  READ ENTITIES OF ZI_Entity IN LOCAL MODE
    ENTITY Entity FIELDS ( EntityID )
    WITH CORRESPONDING #( keys )
    RESULT DATA(entities).
  
  " Set entity ID
  LOOP AT entities ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<entity>).
    <entity>-EntityID = get_next_number( ).
  ENDLOOP.
  
  " Modify entities
  MODIFY ENTITIES OF ZI_Entity IN LOCAL MODE
    ENTITY Entity UPDATE FIELDS ( EntityID )
    WITH CORRESPONDING #( entities ).
ENDMETHOD.

rap-determination.use_when: When Calculated fields, numbering, default values
rap-determination.code_example:
determination setEntityID on modify { create; }
determination calculateTotal on modify { create; update; }
best_practices: Use for numbering and default values

rap-validation.name: Validation Pattern

code.bdef: validation validateDates on save { create; update; }
code.implementation:
METHOD validateDates.
  READ ENTITIES OF ZI_Entity IN LOCAL MODE
    ENTITY Entity FIELDS ( BeginDate EndDate )
    WITH CORRESPONDING #( keys )
    RESULT DATA(entities).
  
  LOOP AT entities ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<entity>).
    IF <entity>-EndDate < <entity>-BeginDate.
      APPEND VALUE #( EntityUUID = <entity>-EntityUUID ) TO failed-entity.
      APPEND VALUE #( EntityUUID = <entity>-EntityUUID
                      %msg = new_message( id = 'ZENTITY'
                                         number = '001'
                                         severity = if_abap_behv_message=>severity-error )
                      %element-BeginDate = if_abap_behv=>mk-on
                      %element-EndDate = if_abap_behv=>mk-on ) TO reported-entity.
    ENDIF.
  ENDLOOP.
ENDMETHOD.

rap-validation.use_when: When Data validation, business rule enforcement
rap-validation.code_example: validation validateDates on save { create; update; }

rap-action.name: Action Pattern
rap-action.scenario: Approval workflows, status changes, complex operations

code.bdef:
action ( features : instance ) submit result [1] $self;
action ( features : instance ) cancel result [1] $self;
code.implementation:
METHOD submit.
  READ ENTITIES OF ZI_Entity IN LOCAL MODE
    ENTITY Entity ALL FIELDS
    WITH CORRESPONDING #( keys )
    RESULT DATA(entities).
  
  LOOP AT entities ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<entity>).
    <entity>-Status = 'S'.
  ENDLOOP.
  
  MODIFY ENTITIES OF ZI_Entity IN LOCAL MODE
    ENTITY Entity UPDATE FIELDS ( Status )
    WITH CORRESPONDING #( entities ).
  
  result = VALUE #( FOR entity IN entities
                    ( EntityUUID = entity-EntityUUID
                      %param = entity ) ).
ENDMETHOD.

rap-action.use_when: When Approval workflows, status changes, complex operations
rap-action.code_example:

action ( features : instance ) cancel result [1] $self;
best_practices: Return result entity for UI updates
Use features: instance for instance-level actions

rap-authorization-instance.name: Instance-Level Authorization
rap-authorization-instance.scenario: Sensitive data requiring record-level access control

code.implementation:
METHOD get_instance_authorizations.
  READ ENTITIES OF ZI_Entity IN LOCAL MODE
    ENTITY Entity ALL FIELDS
    WITH CORRESPONDING #( keys )
    RESULT DATA(entities).
  
  LOOP AT entities INTO DATA(entity).
    AUTHORITY-CHECK OBJECT 'ZENTITY'
      ID 'ACTVT' FIELD '02'
      ID 'AGENCYID' FIELD entity-AgencyID.
    
    IF sy-subrc = 0.
      result = VALUE #( ( EntityUUID = entity-EntityUUID
                         %update = if_abap_behv=>auth-allowed
                         %delete = if_abap_behv=>auth-allowed ) ).
    ELSE.
      result = VALUE #( ( EntityUUID = entity-EntityUUID
                         %update = if_abap_behv=>auth-unauthorized
                         %delete = if_abap_behv=>auth-unauthorized ) ).
    ENDIF.
  ENDLOOP.
ENDMETHOD.

rap-authorization-instance.use_when: When Sensitive data requiring record-level access control
best_practices: Use instance authorization for sensitive data
Combine with DCL rules for field-level security

rap-numbering.name: Numbering Pattern
rap-numbering.description: Automatic number assignment using number ranges

code.implementation:
METHOD setEntityID.
  READ ENTITIES OF ZI_Entity IN LOCAL MODE
    ENTITY Entity FIELDS ( EntityID )
    WITH CORRESPONDING #( keys )
    RESULT DATA(entities).
  
  DATA(number_range) = cl_numberrange_runtime=>number_get(
    exporting
      nr_range_nr = '01'
      object      = 'ZENTITY'
      quantity    = lines( entities )
  ).
  
  LOOP AT entities ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<entity>).
    <entity>-EntityID = number_range-number.
    number_range-number = number_range-number + 1.
  ENDLOOP.
  
  MODIFY ENTITIES OF ZI_Entity IN LOCAL MODE
    ENTITY Entity UPDATE FIELDS ( EntityID )
    WITH CORRESPONDING #( entities ).
ENDMETHOD.

rap-side-effects.name: Side Effects Pattern
rap-side-effects.description: Update related entities when parent changes

code.bdef:
determination calculateTotal on modify { create; update; }
association _Items { create; update; delete; }
code.implementation:
METHOD calculateTotal.
  READ ENTITIES OF ZI_Entity IN LOCAL MODE
    ENTITY Entity ALL FIELDS
    WITH CORRESPONDING #( keys )
    RESULT DATA(entities).
  
  READ ENTITIES OF ZI_Entity IN LOCAL MODE
    ENTITY Entity BY \_Items
    ALL FIELDS WITH CORRESPONDING #( keys )
    RESULT DATA(items).
  
  LOOP AT entities ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<entity>).
    DATA(total) = <entity>-BaseAmount.
    LOOP AT items INTO DATA(item) WHERE EntityUUID = <entity>-EntityUUID.
      total = total + item-Amount.
    ENDLOOP.
    <entity>-TotalAmount = total.
  ENDLOOP.
  
  MODIFY ENTITIES OF ZI_Entity IN LOCAL MODE
    ENTITY Entity UPDATE FIELDS ( TotalAmount )
    WITH CORRESPONDING #( entities ).
ENDMETHOD.

rap-side-effects.code_example:
determination calculateTotal on modify { create; update; }
association _Items { create; update; delete; }
best_practices: Use side effects for calculated totals

rap-composition.name: Composition Pattern

code.cds:
define root view entity ZI_Entity
  as select from zentity
  composition [0..*] of ZI_EntityItem as _Items
{
  key EntityUUID,
      Description,
      _Items
}

define view entity ZI_EntityItem
  as select from zentityitem
  association [0..1] to ZI_Entity as _Entity
    on $projection.EntityUUID = _Entity.EntityUUID
{
  key EntityUUID,
  key ItemUUID,
      Description,
      _Entity
}

rap-field-control.name: Field Control Pattern

code.implementation:
METHOD get_control.
  READ ENTITIES OF ZI_Entity IN LOCAL MODE
    ENTITY Entity FIELDS ( Status Description )
    WITH CORRESPONDING #( keys )
    RESULT DATA(entities).
  
  LOOP AT entities INTO DATA(entity).
    IF entity-Status = 'C'.
      result = VALUE #( ( EntityUUID = entity-EntityUUID
                         %control-Description = if_abap_behv=>mk-on ) ).
    ELSE.
      result = VALUE #( ( EntityUUID = entity-EntityUUID
                         %control-Description = if_abap_behv=>mk-off ) ).
    ENDIF.
  ENDLOOP.
ENDMETHOD.

rap-bulk-operations.name: Bulk Operations Pattern

code.implementation:
METHOD update.
  " Read all entities at once
  READ ENTITIES OF ZI_Entity IN LOCAL MODE
    ENTITY Entity ALL FIELDS
    WITH CORRESPONDING #( keys )
    RESULT DATA(entities).
  
  " Process in bulk
  LOOP AT entities ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<entity>).
    " Process entity
  ENDLOOP.
  
  " Modify all at once
  MODIFY ENTITIES OF ZI_Entity IN LOCAL MODE
    ENTITY Entity UPDATE FIELDS ( Field1 Field2 )
    WITH CORRESPONDING #( entities ).
ENDMETHOD.
